creator: wrightjt@ufl.edu
text:
We've loaded a 4.5MB XML file, and for any query that returns a large portion 
of the data, using the command line or java prog, no output is given, and no 
exception is thrown, like the methods are recursively returning false rather 
than propagating an exception (or timing out and returning false).  Smaller 
query results display, and we can retrieve the document using the rd action. We 
do receive an "Out Of Memory Exception" when retrieving the entire document 
with -q "/", however, but any other larger results do not throw anything.  
Tried both v1.0 and v1.0rc2 with same problem.

creator: Kevin.Ross@iVerticalLeap.com
text:
Please try out 1.1 or the cvs head and reopen the bug if you have issues with 
that version.  If you solve the problem, please submit the patch in diff -u 
format.  If you can prove the bug, please attach a junit test.
